item.description: Join us for D&D Encounters: Dark Legacy of Evard. Bring your own characters made with Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, Players Option: Heroes of Shadow, or any article content in Dragon Magazine that supports these products to make a character. Alternatively, pre-generated characters will be provided.
item.why: Join the fun at Untapped Games for D&D Encounters!
item.name: D&D Encounters: Dark Legacy of Evard
